title: Rescue the Trapped Man
content:
rthwest towards Waukeen's Rest at (X:-31 Y:577).

There, you'll come across Shabby Wooden Doors blocking the entrance. Open them to access the small village, which has been ravaged by battle. Navigate through the destruction to the ruined chapel in the North West corner and follow the minimap's waypoint. On the second floor, a cutscene unfolds, showing Karlach assisting a man trapped on a burning piece of wood. This triggers an update in your Quest Journal, initiating the quest "Rescue the Trapp
